resources.string:
My name is Eshmeeta Singh. 
 I am an undergrad student at National Institute of Technology Srinagar.
 I am pursuing my bachelors in Computer Science Engineering.
 I am a third year student passionate about XR - VIRTUAL AND AUGUMENTED REALITY DEVELOPMENT. 

I am from Srinagar,Kashmir,India. 
 I have done my schooling from PRESENTATION CONVENT HIGH SCHOOL. 
 I have passed my matriculation exam with 99% score and 12 standard with 97% score.
I love being around pets.
 I have a pet dog.\m She is a chowski . Her name is Rusty. She is 4 years old.
